definition: early education (abbr. for 早期教育[zao3 qi1 jiao4 yu4])

sentences.english: All Rights Reserved by Gymboree Early Childhood Education Center.
sentences.chinese: 本次讲座最终解释权归东莞金宝贝早教中心所有。

sentences.english: The two years of specialized early education have done wonders for him.
sentences.chinese: 两年特殊的早教已经在他身上创造了奇迹。

sentences.english: What factors would you consider when you choose early education?
sentences.chinese: 您为宝宝选择早教时会重点考虑哪些因素？

sentences.english: It can improve kids' intellectual growth level.
sentences.chinese: 早教可以促进孩子智力发育。

sentences.english: The party today is in Early Childhood Center.
sentences.chinese: 今天的爬梯是在早教中心。

definition: preschool education/abbr. for 幼兒教育|幼儿教育[you4 er2 jiao4 yu4]
all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
variant of 啟蒙|启蒙[qi3 meng2]/to instruct the young
to instruct the young/to initiate/to awake sb from ignorance/to free sb from prejudice or superstition/primer/enlightened/the Enlightenment/Western learning from the late Qing dynasty
head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
